param.name: _pw_conda_env
param.label: Conda environment (recommended: base)
param.help: Environment to active. The base environment enables changing kernel to other environments!

param.name: _pw_password
param.label: Password for notebook session:
param.help: Enter password or leave blank for no password

param.name: _pw_notebook_dir
param.label: Directory to start JupyterHub GUI
param.help: This is the directory that you start with when the JupyterHub graphical user interface starts. The default value here is your home directory.

param.name: _pw_partition_or_controller
param.label: Partition or controller node?
param.help: Choose to run the service in the controller / login or partition / compute nodes

param.name: _pw_partition
param.label: SLURM partition:
param.help: Partition to submit the interactive job to.

param.name: _pw_walltime
param.label: Walltime
param.help: e.g. 01:00:00 - Amount of time slurm will honor the interactive session.

param.name: _pw_custom_directives
param.label: Additional SLURM directives
param.help: e.g. ;--mem=1000;--gpus-per-node=1 - Use the semicolon character ; before each parameter. Use no spaces.
